summary: The implementation successfully delivers all core requirements for a colour tap game with frontend gameplay, backend persistence, leaderboard, and vibrant visual design. All requested features are present with complete acceptance criteria coverage.

hallucinated_features.reason: The implementation includes full Internet Identity authentication system (useInternetIdentity hook, InternetIdentityProvider, auth-related actor configuration) which was not requested in the BuildRequest. The game appears to be designed for authenticated users, but no authentication requirement was specified.
The CSS includes comprehensive dark mode styling with .dark theme variants, but dark mode was not requested in the requirements or visual design specification.
